title: Medical Practice Competency Enhancement: Public Service Innovation Laboratory Design and Operational Capacity Building

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three core elements of an innovation lab (collaboration networks, civic engagement, knowledge exchange)
Learners perform the process of designing creative prototypes for public service improvement using online collaboration tools
Learners can apply operational strategies for an innovation lab based on the New Public Service (NPS) model to real-world cases
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
